pages.homeSubtitle: AI agent platform for analysis, creation, and distribution.

home.intakeTitle: How can I help you today?
home.intakeSubtitle: Tell us what you need and we will guide you with precision.
home.intakeNote: Tip: share your URL so we can analyze your business.
home.intakePromiseBody: Suggested agent map, priorities, and initial configuration.
home.chatPlaceholder: Paste your URL or tell us what you need...
home.chatError: I could not respond right now.
home.heroSubhead: Design, deploy, and govern AI workflows with traceability and compliance.
home.heroNote: Go live in weeks with full control.
home.capabilitiesBody: We blend discovery, flow design, and secure automation so your team sees measurable results.

capabilities.c1Body: Tool catalog with stable, versioned contracts.
capabilities.c2Body: Audit trails and context control per tenant.
capabilities.c3Body: Web, WhatsApp, and voice with consistent tone.
capabilities.c4Body: MVP with a roadmap for scale and security.

home.stackBody: Modern architecture on Next.js, Vercel, and MCP with repeatable deployments.
home.processTitle: From strategy to production without friction
home.processBody: A clear workflow that aligns business, data, and deployment in weeks.

processSteps.p1Body: We identify use cases and define ROI.
processSteps.p2Body: We model flows, tools, and tenant security.
processSteps.p3Body: We build the MCP and connect channels.
processSteps.p4Body: We measure, iterate, and optimize with data.

home.ctaTitle: Elevate your operation to enterprise level
home.ctaBody: Activate AI agents with full control and consistent performance.

agentsPage.title: Agents ready for your business
agentsPage.subtitle: Explore specialized agents. Pick one and see how it works.
agentsPage.flowStep1Body: Review available agents and their capabilities.
agentsPage.flowStep2Body: Open the detail page and confirm the fit.
agentsPage.flowStep3Body: Choose a plan and enable the channel you want.

marketing.name: Marketing
marketing.summary: Attract customers, build interest, and convert with clear messaging.
marketing.ideal: Teams that want to grow demand and brand.

features.f1: Designs campaigns by product or segment.

sales.name: Sales
sales.tagline: Qualify and close opportunities with precise replies.
sales.summary: Turn conversations into revenue with clear follow-up.
sales.ideal: Sales teams with high lead volume.

appointments.name: Appointments
appointments.tagline: Schedule appointments with low friction and confirm key details.
appointments.summary: Coordinate times, collect data, and reduce no-shows.
appointments.ideal: Businesses that depend on appointments and bookings.

support.name: Support
support.tagline: Resolve questions and hand off to a human when needed.
support.summary: Consistent support backed by knowledge base.
support.ideal: Teams that want to reduce repeated tickets.

public_voice.name: Public Voice
public_voice.summary: Voice-first support with short, clear responses.
public_voice.ideal: Businesses with phone or kiosk support.
